entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
